wikipedia_page.main: Cecil Frank Powell, FRS (5 December 1903 – 9 August 1969) was a British physicist, and Nobel Prize in Physics laureate for heading the team that developed the photographic method of studying nuclear processes and for the resulting discovery of the pion (pi-meson), a subatomic particle.

response: *  1969   – C. F. Powell, English physicist and academic, Nobel Prize laureate (b. 1903)
*  1903   – C. F. Powell, English-Italian physicist and academic, Nobel Prize laureate (d. 1969)
